You have been accepted as a poster presenter at ISCB46 - congratulations! In this document we summarize answers to some common questions and further instructions.

Please find below some guidance for creating and submitting your poster for the conference:

## Poster sessions

- Poster Number: You will receive your assigned poster number in the conference program.
- Exhibition Day: Each presenter will be allocated one of the three conference days to display their poster.
- Setup: Please put up your poster in the morning (starting from 8:00 when the building opens until prior to the first coffee break or the poster exhibition on Tuesday) of your assigned day. Pins will be provided.
- Removal: **Posters must be taken down by 18:00 on the same day. Posters not removed by this time will be discarded.**
- Engagement: There are no dedicated poster sessions. However, we encourage you to stand by your poster during coffee breaks and lunch on your assigned day to engage with attendees.

## Poster Format

Size: <b>A0 portrait</b> orientation.  

Printing: Note that there is <b>no printing service at the conference</b> and you will need to bring your printed poster with you.


## Submitting your poster

* <b>For your poster to be available in the online platform and online participants, please submit your poster in PDF format within your [conftool](https://www.conftool.org/iscb2025/index.php?page=login) account no later than Sunday, 17<sup>th</sup> of August, 2025.</b>
*	If you want to update your poster PDF for the online platform, you can upload a new file the same way the first one was uploaded, but no later than 17<sup>th</sup> of August, 2025.


### Upload Instructions

* When logging into conftool you can click on “Your Submission” to see your submission:  
  ![](img/guidance/poster-yoursubmissions.png)  
* Then click on final upload:
  ![](img/guidance/poster-finalupload.png)
* After choosing your PDF file please upload and save the data. 
  ![](img/guidance/poster-choosefile.png)
